name: Subterrestial - To Challenge a God
description:
Mysterious kidnappings have begun in the town of Neria, and deep within the heart of its forest, lies an underground city where a grand scheme of godlike proportions threatens to obliterate an entire region. With the livestock disappearing as well, and the plantlife failing, only a few inhabitants remain willing to stand by their town until the very end. Now, a Fox Demon and a Magic Swordsman are the last line of defense before the irreversible occurs. Ready to brave the mythical forest, Divinity's Playground, and uncover its secret, Ozma and Ry travel to Neria, and prepare for their greatest battle yet in this epic RPG Platformer!

FOLLOW FOR NEW RELEASES/UPDATES

www.thefoolishbravegame.tumblr.com

www.thefoolishbrave.com

www.twitter.com/thefoolishbrave

  • Gorgeous pixel art!
  • Original JRPG Music
  • Classic Platforming an RPG Mechanics!
  • Interactive Town and NPCs!
  • An epic plot containing gods, deception, and character development
  • Giant Boss Fights!
